SELECT p.product_name, COUNT(*) product_count, SUM(inv.inv_current_qty) total_current_qty, SUM(inv.inv_damaged_qty) total_damaged_qty, MAX(inv.inv_last_date) last_date FROM inventory inv JOIN warehouse w ON w.warehouse_id = inv.inv_warehouse_id JOIN product p ON p.product_id = inv.inv_product_id
GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY product_count DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(h.history_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN h.history_type = 1 THEN h.history_quantity ELSE 0 END) AS in_quantity, SUM(CASE WHEN h.history_type = 2 THEN h.history_quantity ELSE 0 END) AS out_quantity FROM history h WHERE h.history_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(h.history_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(h.history_date, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, SUM(CASE WHEN h.history_type = 1 THEN h.history_quantity * p.product_price ELSE 0 END) AS total_cost, SUM(CASE WHEN h.history_type = 2 THEN h.history_quantity * p.delivery_price ELSE 0 END) AS total_revenue FROM history h JOIN product p ON h.history_product_id = p.product_id WHERE h.history_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY TO_CHAR(h.history_date, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY month ASC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT p.product_name, SUM(h.history_quantity) AS total_out_quantity FROM product p JOIN history h ON p.product_id = h.history_product_id WHERE h.history_type = 2 AND h.history_date BETWEEN ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -12) AND SYSDATE GROUP BY p.product_name ORDER BY total_out_quantity DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT w.warehouse_name, w.warehouse_capacity, NVL(SUM(i.inv_current_qty), 0) AS used_capacity, w.warehouse_capacity - NVL(SUM(i.inv_current_qty), 0) AS remaining_capacity FROM warehouse w LEFT JOIN inventory i ON w.warehouse_id = i.inv_warehouse_id GROUP BY w.warehouse_name, w.warehouse_capacity ORDER BY remaining_capacity ASC
